synopsis.text: Story of ambition, music, and friendship unfolds in the animated film "Kono Sekai no Tanoshimikata: Secret Story Film," marking the 10th anniversary of the HoneyWorks franchise. The movie delves into the origins of the popular male idol duo, LIPxLIP, comprising high school seniors Yujiro and Aizo. As they navigate through numerous casting calls and challenges, the duo's unwavering determination to achieve their dreams is put to the test. Before they rise to stardom, Yujiro and Aizo must repeatedly prove their worth to skeptical producers and fellow competitors. Witness the trials and triumphs that shape the journey of LIPxLIP in this captivating tale of pursuing one's passion against all odds.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
